version_description:
・Bug fixes.
・You can update your steps in real time by Motion & Fitness Censor.

・Bug fixes.
・You can update your steps in real time by Motion & Fitness Censor.

We changed the default app icon.
And fixed the problem of Motion and Fitness censor.

And fixed the problem of Motion and Fitness censor.

We changed the default app icon.
And fixed the problem of Motion and Fitness censor.

We changed the default app icon.
And fixed the problem of Motion and Fitness censor.

We changed that,
* Adding English UK settings.
* New app icon
* Suit for Dark Mode
* New theme color Monotone Black

And we fixed that,,,
* Memo area space will be more wide.
* Calendar steps font size will be more big.
* and some crash bugs.

We changed that,
* Adding English UK settings.
* New app icon
* Suit for Dark Mode
* New theme color Monotone Black

And we fixed that,,,
* Memo area space will be more wide.
* Calendar steps font size will be more big.
* and some crash bugs.

- The loading of the steps at startup has been sped up!
- Press the tab at the bottom of the screen twice to return to today's date.
- Fixed a bug that the calculation of the average number of steps for the month on the report screen was wrong in rare cases.
- Added an automatic loading function on the calendar screen.
- Fixed some bugs.

- The loading of the steps at startup has been sped up!
- Press the tab at the bottom of the screen twice to return to today's date.
- Fixed a bug that the calculation of the average number of steps for the month on the report screen was wrong in rare cases.
- Added an automatic loading function on the calendar screen.
- Fixed some bugs.

- The data output file has been neatly arranged.
- The setting screen has been made easier to see.
- The last graph format opened in the graph screen has been improved to be remembered.
